Publication Title: Treatment of evolving cancers will require dynamic decision support
Publication Keywords: Mathematical Modeling, Cancer Ecology And Evolution, Treatment Scheduling
Publication Authors: M A R Strobl, J Gallaher, M Robertson-Tessi, J West, A R A Anderson
Publication Abstract: Cancer research has traditionally focused on developing new agents, but an underexplored question is that of the dose and frequency of existing drugs. Based on the modus operandi established in the early days of chemotherapies, most drugs are administered according to predetermined schedules that seek to deliver the maximum tolerated dose and are only adjusted for toxicity.
